medical_history.chief_complaint: Severe Behçet disease resistant to conventional therapy.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Behçet disease diagnosed at age 63; has had recurrent fever, oral and genital ulcers, and other complications for 12 years, with worsening symptoms over time despite various treatments including high-dose prednisone, cyclosporine, azathioprine, and infliximab.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Diagnosed with Behçet disease at age 63; previous treatments have included high-dose prednisone, cyclosporine, azathioprine, and infliximab.
medical_history.social_history: Patient reported being generally healthy, physically active, and a non-smoker with no history of alcohol abuse.
